markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gloomseer](/Feats.aspx?ID=942) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 12 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Nidalese ethnicity

</column>

---

Gloom holds few terrors for you, and the pall of darkness over Nidal has made you comfortable in dim light. You gain [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416).

<title level="2">Gloomseer leads to...</title>
[Darkseer](/Feats.aspx?ID=950)
name: Gloomseer
